title: Bug 7406NPE: adaptable and filters don't work together for property page contributions
description: Bug 7406NPE: adaptable and filters don't work together for property page contributions
OB: If a property page contribution is filtered by project nature, and its markedas adaptable, the filter is ignored for the adapted case.Specifically, ourCVS property page shows up on nonCVS Java Projects.As a result, the following steps in our 2.0 work will cause a NPE:1. You will erroneously have a CVS page. Go to another page, make a change, Finish.You will get a NPE from the CVS properties page finish because the projectisn't a CVS project and the page should never have been there.
SR: Open the property dialog on a Java project in the Packages view which hasn'tyet been connected to a CVS repository (so no CVS nature).2. Go to the CVS page but dont make anychanges.3. Go to another page, make a change, Finish.You will get a NPE from the CVS properties page finish because the projectisn't a CVS project and the page should never have been there.
